dc.title: DoD OSBP | Department of Defense Office of Small Business Programs
dc.description: To advise the Secretary of Defense on all matters related to small business and are committed to maximizing the contributions of small business in DoD acquisitions. We provide leadership and governance to the Military Departments and Defense Agencies to meet the needs of the nationâ€™s Warfighters, creating opportunities for small businesses while ensuring each tax dollar is spent responsibly
